rosa walakulu: ada dawasa shila yugaye sita ilektronika yugaya dakwa yugayen yugaya samathikramanaya karamin pamini gaman maga,minisata labunu watinama de....thaman palanaya wana krama wedayata dayaka wiya haki....prajathanthrawadayayi...upathe sita maranaya dakwa ekineka samaga gatemin samuhika sathwayeku lesa jiwath wana minisa aarthikaya thula...aarthika sathwayeku lesada, samajaya thula samuhika sathwayeku lesada emenma deshapalanaya thula , deshapalana sathwayaku lesada kriya karayi!!..minisa wisin minisun udesa minisata kriyathmaka wana me prajathanthra wadaye...paramadhipathyaye balaya suluwata thakiya nohaka...eya kotuwak matha kathirayak gasimak pamanak nedayi..samaharawita oba magen asanu atha..namuth obath mamath thawath boho ayath gasana kathira matha..obeth mageth apa rateth anagathaya thiranaya wanu atha...oba niwaradi pudgalayaku soya wehesenu atha..obe kathiraya gasimata sudussaku oba soyanawa wiya haka....obata niwaradi pudgalayaku soya gatha nohaka..manda, obada mamada waradi kara aththemu!!

indiyanu krikat kridawa wenuwen wasara wisi hatharaka agana sewayakin pasu wishrama gath supiri krikat tharuwak wu sachin thendulkar pasasima nawatha damana lesa pakisthanaye thaliban karalikaruwan erata madhya wetha anathuru angawimak kara atha.samastha lokaye krikat kridakayan athara ihalama lakunu pramanayak ras kala pithikaruwek wu thendulkar me masa muladi wishrama ganimen pasu pakisthanu madhya magin athishaya warnanawata lakwi thibuni.ek puwathpathak ohu thendulkar handunwa di thibune asamana wishishtayek lesayi.widiyo paniwudayak nikuth kala thaliban prakashaka shaidulla sahid kiya thibune ketharam dakshayeku wuwath pakisthanu madhya magin ohu warnana kirima nokala yuthu bawayi.thendulkar warnanaya 'pakisthan jathika wadayatath, pakisthanaye kere athi pakshapathithwayatath' wiruddha bawayi ohu kiya sitiye.ee wenuwata pahala mattame kridakayek wuwath pakisthanu krikat nayaka misbar al hak ta sahaya pala kala yuthu bawa ohu prakasha kaleya.
oya kiyana rata thiyenne kohe da?
ese nomathiwa me wannakata kotharam prabala rajayakata wuwada muhunadiya nohakiyi.me nisa jathika aapada kalamanakarana mandalayak ha eeta upades dena upadeshaka sabhawak awashyayi.
